name: MacBook Pro 13''
description: The new M2 chip makes the 13-inch MacBook Pro more capable than ever. The same compact design supports up to 20 hours of battery life1 and an active cooling system to sustain enhanced performance. Featuring a brilliant Retina display, a FaceTime HD camera, and studio-quality mics, it's our most portable pro laptop.
features: All-day battery Up to 20 hours of battery life, go long

cards.name: M2 chip
cards.description: M2 has 100GB per second of memory bandwidth

cards.name: All-day battery
cards.description: Up to 20 hours of battery life, go long

cards.name: Camera and mics
cards.description: Be seen. Be heard: Thanks to M2, the FaceTime HD camera takes full advantage of our latest image signal processor

name: Dell 5520 G15
description: Dell G15 is a middle-of-the pack budget gaming laptop that delivers sharp, smooth 1080p gaming in a no-frills package, Max performance, Vivid visuals, Stylish color options

name: HP Pavilion 15
description: Do your thing, anywhere, with the help of the compact HP Pavilion 15'' Laptop. Effectively tackle any assignment with the powerful Intel® processor and precision touchpad.

name: Lenovo Ideapad 3
description: Tailor your performance with the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 15-inch laptop. Engineered to deliver powerful, long-lasting performance, this Windows laptop has the new AMD Ryzen 3 3250U mobile processors with Radeon Vega 3 graphics, allowing you to get more done faster.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book
description: Get the fast, reliable power you need to make things run smoothly. Download your work. Stream your favorite show. Multitask at a moment’s notice. Do it all with minimal lag time, thanks to a dedicated graphics card and the latest 11th Generation Intel® CoreTM i5 and i7 processors.
